name: ARS Electronica #3 Inching Toward Freedom in Confinement
description:
Video feedback piece for ARS Electronica 2021, Festival for Art, Technology, & Society
Garden NEW YORK CITY
8-12 Sept. 

Created with Hydra Code and ran into two video mixers with feedback. After exploring I came upon a place where colors began inching their way to escape the screen. The screen which gave them life, also confined them.
